metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32558 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Sangoma Asterisk 13.x before 13.38.3, 16.xbefore 16.19.1, 17.x before 17.9.4, and 18.x before 18.5.1, and CertifiedAsterisk before 16.8-cert10. If the IAX2 channel driver receives a packetthat contains an unsupported media format, a crash can occur.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
